## FormService.open() method

Opens the specified form as a form sheet

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
open<TForm, TFormState = unknown>(config: FormServiceConfig<TForm, TFormState>): MatBottomSheetRef<FormSheetWrapperComponent, TForm>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  config | [FormServiceConfig](./form-sheet.formserviceconfig.md)<!-- -->&lt;TForm, TFormState&gt; |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

MatBottomSheetRef&lt;[FormSheetWrapperComponent](./form-sheet.formsheetwrappercomponent.md)<!-- -->, TForm&gt;

A reference to the bottom sheet with the form.
